title: Bug 122584 - Cascading parameter values not displayed properly in HTML viewer
description: Description: Cascading parameter values can't be displayed properly in the HTML viewer.
OB: When selecting the first parameter value, the expected behavior is that the second parameter value in the same cascading parameter group should be displayed. However, it is not displayed as intended.
EB: The expected behavior is that when selecting a parameter value, all relevant cascading parameter values associated with that selection should be displayed in the HTML viewer.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Preview the attached design file in the HTML viewer.
2. Click on the 'change parameter' button in the HTML viewer.
3. Follow these steps to observe the improper display of cascading parameter values.
